segments.text: Could I have my bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid there has been a mistake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . What seems to be the trouble ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you have charged me twice for the same thing . Look , the figure of 6.5 dollar appears here , then again here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll just go and check it for you , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
